data.name: Military Base War
data.detailed_description:
Face a group of enemies where each type has its own behavior, trying to either destroy you or the blue cube that you have to protect.
Eliminate all enemies in the stage, then move to the next stage



- Destroy all enemies to move to a new stage
- Protect yourself and the blue cube
- Take advantage of the tools that fall from the enemies to continue
- AI of the enemies is varied, each type of enemy has a specific goal that they strive towards, some of them continue to pursue you and some of them head directly to the blue cube.
- The game stages are divided into several chapters, and each chapter will present a new type of challenge.
If you lose, you will have to come back from the first stage
- If you close the game, you can start from the last stage you reached

data.short_description: Top Down Shooter, Face a group of enemies where each type has its own behavior, trying to either destroy you or the blue cube that you have to protect. Eliminate all enemies in the stage, then move to the next stage

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: GTX 460
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: you need a graphic card that support HDR and DX11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: GTX 940
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: you need a graphic card that support HDR and DX11
